item.title: Jenn add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle." -- Plato

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Jenn add a quote by A.A. Milne
Jenn add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jenn add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "You think your pain and your heartbreak are unprecedented in the history of the world, but then you read. It was books that taught me that the things that tormented me most were the very things that connected me with all the people who were alive, or who had ever been alive." -- James Baldwin

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jimmy Stewart, Elwood P. Dowd, Harvey
item.description: "Well, I've wrestled with reality for 35 years, Doctor, and I'm happy to state I finally won out over it." -- Jimmy Stewart, Elwood P. Dowd, Harvey

item.title: Jenn add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
